description: All tables related to HDInsight Service.

tables.name: HDInsightKafkaLogs
tables.description: All logs from HDInsight Kafka Logs.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

columns.name: LogLevel
columns.description: log level of message (INFO, WARN, ERROR, etc.).

columns.name: Message
columns.description: message from Kafka log.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: LogType
columns.description: The name of the log file that a record came from (e.g. KafkaServer, KafkaController).

tables.name: HDInsightKafkaMetrics
tables.description: All metrics from Kafka clusters.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: MetricNamespace
columns.description: Category of metric (e.g. RequestMetrics, BrokerTopicMetrics, KafkaController, etc).

columns.name: MetricName
columns.description: Name of the metric for the record (e.g. OfflinePartitionsCount, UnderReplicatedPartitions, LeaderCount, etc).

columns.name: MetricValue
columns.description: Value of metric in the record.

columns.name: MetricDataType
columns.description: CollectD datatype of the metric (e.g. gauge, counter, etc.). Determines how metric is portrayed over time. Please reference CollectD documentation for more information: https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/Data_source .

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Information about the record. For example a record may be tagged with 'kafka.network' if it is a network related metric.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

tables.name: HDInsightHBaseLogs
tables.description: All logs from HDInsight HBase Logs.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: LogLevel
columns.description: log level of message (INFO, WARN, ERROR, etc.).

columns.name: Message
columns.description: message from HBase log.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: ClusterType
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: LogType
columns.description: The name of the log file that a record came from (e.g. RegionServer, HMaster).

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

tables.name: HDInsightHBaseMetrics
tables.description: JMX metrics from HBase clusters.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: MetricNamespace
columns.description: Category of metric (value of the jmx query string e.g. Hadoop:service=HBase,name=Master,sub=IPC, etc).

columns.name: MetricName
columns.description: Name of the metric for the record (e.g. queueSize, receivedBytes, numActiveHandler, etc).

columns.name: MetricValue
columns.description: Value of metric in the record.

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Information about the record. For example a record may be tagged with 'master' if it is in the HMaster context.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: ClusterType
columns.description: Type of the cluster.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

tables.name: HDInsightStormLogs
tables.description: All Logs from Storm cluster nodes.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

columns.name: Message
columns.description: message from Storm log.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: LogType
columns.description: The name of the log file that a record came from (e.g. StormNimbus, StormSupervisor).

columns.name: LogLevel
columns.description: The severity level of the log (e.g. INFO,WARN, ERROR, etc.)

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

tables.name: HDInsightStormMetrics
tables.description: Cluster Level Metrics from Storm clusters.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: MetricNamespace
columns.description: Category of metric(e.g. StormNimbusMetrics, StormSupervisorMetrics, etc).

columns.name: MetricName
columns.description: Name of the metric for the record (e.g. num-submitTopology-calls-Count).

columns.name: MetricValue
columns.description: Value of metric in the record.

columns.name: MetricDataType
columns.description: CollectD datatype of the metric (e.g. gauge, counter, etc.). Determines how metric is portrayed over time. Please reference CollectD documentation for more information: https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/Data_source .

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

tables.name: HDInsightStormTopologyMetrics
tables.description: Topology Level Metrics from Storm clusters.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
The number of Tuple “trees” successfully processed. A value of 0 is expected if no acking is done.

columns.name: AssignedCPUPercent
columns.description: Percent of CPU cores assigned to the topology.

columns.name: AssignedMemOffHeapMB
columns.description: MB of off heap memory assigned to the topology.

columns.name: AssignedMemOnHeapMB
columns.description: MB of on heap memory assigned to the topology.

columns.name: AssignedTotalMemMB
columns.description: MB of total memory assigned to the topology.

columns.name: BoltId
columns.description: The ID of the bolt.

columns.name: Capacity
columns.description: If this is around 1.0, the corresponding Bolt is running as fast as it can, so you may want to increase the Bolt’s parallelism. This is (number executed * average execute latency) / measurement time.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: The name of the cluster.

columns.name: ClusterType
columns.description: The type of the cluster.

columns.name: CompleteLatencyMs
columns.description: The average time (millisecond) a Tuple “tree” takes to be completely processed by the Topology. A value of 0 is expected if no acking is done.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

columns.name: Debug
columns.description: Boolean representing whether debug tracing is activated.
The number of Tuples emitted.

columns.name: EncodedBoltId
columns.description: The encoded ID of the bolt.

columns.name: EncodedId
columns.description: The enocded ID of the topology.

columns.name: EncodedSpoutId
columns.description: The encoded ID of the Spout.

columns.name: ErrorHost
columns.description: Host where the error occurred.

columns.name: ErrorPort
columns.description: Port associated with the error.

columns.name: ErrorWorkerLogLink
columns.description: Link to the log of the worker where an error occurred.
The number of incoming Tuples processed.

columns.name: ExecuteLatencyMs
columns.description: The average time (millisecond) a Tuple spends in the execute method. The execute method may complete without sending an Ack for the tuple.

columns.name: Executors
columns.description: The number of threads being used to execute a task.

columns.name: ExecutorsTotal
columns.description: The total amount of executors currently used and already used to execute a task.
The number of Tuple “trees” that were explicitly failed or timed out before acking was completed. A value of 0 is expected if no acking is done.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Hostname of the host the record came from.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: The name of the component the record is from (could be spout, bolt, or name of topology).

columns.name: InstanceName
columns.description: Type of record shape (there are bolt, spout, topology, and topology_stats record shapes).

columns.name: LastError
columns.description: Last error to occur in the component.

columns.name: MsgTimeout
columns.description: The number of seconds until a message times out.

columns.name: TopologyName
columns.description: Name of the topology.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

columns.name: Owner
columns.description: Name of the user that owns the topology.

columns.name: ProcessLatencyMs
columns.description: The average time (millisecond) it takes to Ack a Tuple after it is first received. Bolts that join, aggregate or batch may not Ack a tuple until a number of other Tuples have been received(.

columns.name: ReplicationCount
columns.description: The amount of replicas kept by the topology.

columns.name: RequestedCpuPercent
columns.description: The percent of CPU requested by the topology.

columns.name: RequestMemOffHeapMB
columns.description: MB of off heap memory requested by the topology.

columns.name: RequestMemOnHeapMB
columns.description: MB of on heap memory requested by the topology.

columns.name: SamplingPct
columns.description: Percentage of messages sampled to calculate metrics.

columns.name: SchedulerDisplayResource
columns.description: Boolean describing the scheduler display setting.

columns.name: SpoutId
columns.description: The ID of the spout.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: The status of the topology.

columns.name: Tasks
columns.description: The number of tasks running.

columns.name: TasksTotal
columns.description: The total amount of tasks run.

columns.name: TopologyId
columns.description: The ID of the topology.
The number of Tuples emitted that sent to one or more bolts.

columns.name: Uptime
columns.description: The length of time an Executor (thread) has been alive.

columns.name: UptimeSeconds
columns.description: The amount of time the topology has been running in seconds.

columns.name: Window
columns.description: The time window for the metrics in the record in seconds.

columns.name: WindowHint
columns.description: The time window for the metrics in the record in hours, minutes, seconds format.

columns.name: WindowPretty
columns.description: String description of the time window for the metrics in the record.

columns.name: Workers
columns.description: JSON with worker specific metrics.

columns.name: WorkersTotal
columns.description: The total amount of workers.

tables.name: HDInsightGatewayAuditLogs
tables.description: Authentication audit logs from HDInsight Gateway nodes.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: The username used for the login attempt.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: The outcome of the login attempt.

columns.name: ClusterDnsName
columns.description: The DNS name of the cluster.

columns.name: AccessRequestCount
columns.description: Number of login requests associated with the user.

columns.name: ErrorMessage
columns.description: Any error message associated with the login attempt.

tables.name: HDInsightAmbariSystemMetrics
tables.description: System metrics from each individual node generated by Ambari.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: CpuIdle
columns.description: Percent of CPU time spent in idle state in past cycle.

columns.name: CpuNice
columns.description: Percent of CPU time spent running processes with positive nice values.

columns.name: NumberOfCpu
columns.description: Number of CPU cores running on the node.

columns.name: CpuSystem
columns.description: Percent of CPU time spent running system level processes in past cycle.

columns.name: CpuUser
columns.description: Percent of CPU time spent running user level processes in past cycle.

columns.name: CpuIOWait
columns.description: Percent of CPU time spent waiting for I/O requests in past cycle.

columns.name: DiskFree
columns.description: Amount of free disk space (in GB).

columns.name: DiskTotal
columns.description: Total disk space (in GB).

columns.name: ReadBytes
columns.description: Number of bytes read.

columns.name: ReadCount
columns.description: Number of read operations.

columns.name: ReadTime
columns.description: Time spent on read operations.

columns.name: WriteBytes
columns.description: Number of bytes written.

columns.name: WriteCount
columns.description: Number of write operations.

columns.name: WriteTime
columns.description: Time spent on write operations.

columns.name: FifteenMinutLoad
columns.description: load over past 15 minutes.

columns.name: FiveMinuteLoad
columns.description: load over past five minutes.

columns.name: OneMinuteLoad
columns.description: load over past one minute.

columns.name: CachedMemory
columns.description: amount of cached memory in KB.

columns.name: FreeMemory
columns.description: amount of free memory in KB.

columns.name: SharedMemory
columns.description: amount of sharedmemory in KB.

columns.name: TotalMemory
columns.description: total amount of memory in KB.

columns.name: FreeSwapMemory
columns.description: amount of free swap memory in KB.

columns.name: BytesIn
columns.description: Bytes ingested in last timeframe.

columns.name: BytesOut
columns.description: Bytes sent out.

columns.name: PacketsIn
columns.description: Packets ingest in last timeframe.

columns.name: PacketsOut
columns.description: Packets sent out in last timeframe.

columns.name: ProcessesRun
columns.description: Processes run in last timeframe.

columns.name: TotalProcesses
columns.description: Total amount of processes run on host.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of the cluster the host belongs to.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of the host the record came from.

columns.name: ClusterType
columns.description: Type of cluster the record came from.

tables.name: HDInsightAmbariClusterAlerts
tables.description: Cluster Alerts generated by Ambari.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: ReferenceURI
columns.description: The URI to the alert.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: The name of the cluster the alert came from.

columns.name: ComponentName
columns.description: The component that generated the alert.

columns.name: DefinitionId
columns.description: Id of the alert definition.

columns.name: DefinitionName
columns.description: Name of the alert definition

columns.name: AlertFirmness
columns.description: The firmness of the alert.

columns.name: HostFQDN
columns.description: The FQDN of the host where the alert was generated.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: The name of the host where the alert was generated.

columns.name: AlertID
columns.description: The ID of the alert message.

columns.name: AlertInstance
columns.description: Instance number of the alert.

columns.name: Label
columns.description: The label of the alert.

columns.name: LatestTimestamp
columns.description: The latest time the alert occurred.

columns.name: OriginalTimestamp
columns.description: The timestamp the alert first occurred.

columns.name: MaintenanceState
columns.description: The maintenance classifaction state of the alert.

columns.name: Occurences
columns.description: The number of times an alert has occurred.

columns.name: RepeatTolerance
columns.description: The total number of occurences an alert can have before being escalated.

columns.name: RepeatToleranceRemaining
columns.description: The amount of occurences left before an alert gets escalted.

columns.name: Scope
columns.description: The scope of the alert.

columns.name: ServiceName
columns.description: The name of the service that generated the alert.

columns.name: State
columns.description: The state of the alert.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: The informational text of the alert.

columns.name: ClusterType
columns.description: The type of cluster where the alert was generated.

columns.name: SubmissionTime

columns.description: The DNS name of the cluster running the application.

columns.description: The region of the cluster running the application.

columns.name: IpAddress

columns.description: The subscription ID of the cluster running the stage.

tables.name: HDInsightSparkStageTaskAccumulables
tables.description: Spark Stage Task Accumulables.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: ApplicationId
columns.description: The application ID of the application producing the record.

columns.name: Entity
columns.description: The name of the entity being described.

columns.name: EntityId
columns.description: The ID of the entity.

columns.name: ParentId
columns.description: The ID of the parent entity.

columns.name: MetricId
columns.description: The ID of the metric.

columns.name: MetricName
columns.description: The name of the metric.

columns.name: MetricValue
columns.description: The value of the metric.

columns.name: ClusterTenantId
columns.description: The tenant ID of the cluster where the metric was collected.

columns.name: Role
columns.description: The type of node where the metric was collected.

columns.name: Host
columns.description: The FQDN of the host where the metric was collected.

columns.name: ClusterDnsName
columns.description: The DNS name of the cluster where the metric was collected.

columns.name: Region
columns.description: The region of the cluster where the metric was collected.

columns.name: IpAddress

columns.name: UserSubscriptionId

tables.name: HDInsightSparkTaskEvents
tables.description: Spark Task Events.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: ApplicationId
columns.description: The application ID of the application producing the record.

columns.name: StageId
columns.description: The ID of the stage associated with the task.

columns.name: TaskId
columns.description: The ID of the task.

columns.name: AttemptId
columns.description: The ID of task attempt.

columns.name: ExecutorId
columns.description: The ID executor.

columns.name: LaunchTime
columns.description: The time (UTC) the task was launched.

columns.name: FinishTime
columns.description: The time (UTC) the task finished.

columns.name: Failed
columns.description: Boolean describing whether the task failed.

columns.name: Killed
columns.description: Boolean describing whether the task was killed.

columns.name: EndReason
columns.description: Reason why the task ended.

columns.name: TaskType
columns.description: The task type.

columns.name: DiskBytesSpilled
columns.description: The number of disk bytes spilled.

columns.name: ExecutorCPUTime
columns.description: The CPU time consumed by the task executor.

columns.name: ExecutorDeserializeCPUTime
columns.description: The CPU time the task executor spent deserializing.

columns.name: ExecutorDeserializeTime
columns.description: The time the task executor spent deserializing.

columns.name: ExecutorRunTime
columns.description: The time task executor spent running.

columns.name: JvmGcTime
columns.description: The time the JVM spent garbage collecting.

columns.name: MemoryBytesSpilled
columns.description: The bytes of memory spilled.

columns.name: ResultSerializationTime
columns.description: The serialization time spent while getting the result.

columns.name: ResultSize
columns.description: Size of the result.

columns.name: ShuffleReadMetrics
columns.description: The metrics associated with shuffle reads.

columns.name: ShuffleWriteMetrics
columns.description: The metrics associated with shuffle writes.

columns.name: InputMetrics
columns.description: The metrics associated with the task input.

columns.name: OutputMetrics
columns.description: The metrics associated with the task output.

columns.name: UpdatedBlocks
columns.description: The number of updated blocks.

columns.name: PeakExecutionMemory
columns.description: The peak amount of memory used during execution.

columns.name: SchedulerDelay
columns.description: The amount of delay the scheduler experienced.

columns.name: RecordsRead
columns.description: The number of records read during the task.

columns.name: BytesRead
columns.description: The number bytes read during the task.

columns.name: RecordsWritten
columns.description: The number of records written by the task.

columns.name: BytesWritten
columns.description: The number of bytes written by the task.

columns.name: ShuffleFetchWaitTime
columns.description: The time spent waitng for fetching.

columns.name: ShuffleTotalBytesRead
columns.description: The number bytes read during the shuffle task.

columns.name: ShuffleTotalBlocksFetched
columns.description: The number of blocks fethced during the shuffle task.

columns.name: ShuffleLocalBlocksFetched
columns.description: The number of local blocks fethced during the shuffle task.

columns.name: ShuffleRemoteBlocksFetched
columns.description: The number of remote blocks fethced during the shuffle task.

columns.name: ShuffleWriteTime
columns.description: The time spent writing during the shuffle task.

columns.name: ShuffleBytesWritten
columns.description: The bytes written during the shuffle task.

columns.name: ShuffleRecordsWritten
columns.description: The number of records written during the shuffle task.

columns.name: NumUpdatedBlockStatuses
columns.description: The number updated block statuses during the task.

columns.name: ClusterTenantId
columns.description: The tenant ID of the cluster running the task.

columns.name: Role
columns.description: The type of node running the task.

columns.name: Host
columns.description: The FQDN of the host running the task.

columns.name: ClusterDnsName
columns.description: The DNS name of the cluster running the task.

columns.name: Region
columns.description: The region of the cluster running the task.

columns.name: IpAddress
columns.description: The IP Address of the node running the task.

columns.name: UserSubscriptionId
columns.description: The subscription ID of the cluster running the task

tables.name: HDInsightSparkLogs
tables.description: All logs from related to Spark including Jupyter and Livy logs.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

columns.name: LogLevel
columns.description: log level of message (INFO, WARN, ERROR, etc.).

columns.name: Message
columns.description: message from HBase log.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: LogType
columns.description: The name of the log file that a record came from (e.g. SparkExecutorLog, SparkDriverLog).

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

tables.name: HDInsightSecurityLogs
tables.description: Security related logs including Ambari Audit and Auth Log.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

columns.name: Message
columns.description: message from log file.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: LogType
columns.description: The name of the log file that a record came from (e.g. AmbariAuditLog, AuthLog).

tables.name: HDInsightRangerAuditLogs
tables.description: Audit logs from the Ranger component (only for ESP clusters).

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

columns.name: ClusterName
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: ClusterType
columns.description: Type of the cluster that emitted the record.

columns.name: RepoType
columns.description: Integer representing the repo type.

columns.name: Repo
columns.description: Name the repo.

columns.name: RequestUser
columns.description: Username associated with the event.

columns.name: AccessName
columns.description: Name of the access method.

columns.name: ClusterResource
columns.description: Resource involved in request event.

columns.name: ClusterResourceType
columns.description: The type of resource accessed.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: Type of action made by the event.

columns.name: Result
columns.description: Status code of the event result.

columns.name: Policy
columns.description: Code representing the policy.

columns.name: Enforcer
columns.description: Name of the policy enforcer.

columns.name: RequestData
columns.description: Source that provides the request data.

columns.name: SessionId
columns.description: ID associated witht the user session.

columns.name: CliType
columns.description: Type of CLI used to create request.

columns.name: CliIpAddress
columns.description: IP address of where CLI request was made.

columns.name: LogType
columns.description: Type of log the record came from.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: ID of the event request.

columns.name: SequenceNumber
columns.description: Sequence number of the event.

columns.name: EventCount
columns.description: Number of events associated with the request.

columns.name: EventDurationMs
columns.description: Duration of the event in milliseconds.

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: List of tags associated with the event.

columns.name: AdditionalInfo
columns.description: Additional info about the request including the remote and forwarded IPs

columns.description: Information about the record. For example a record may be tagged with 'LlapDaemon' if it came from that process.

columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.

columns.name: Entity
columns.description: Name of the query's entity.

columns.name: EntityType
columns.description: The type of the query's entity.

columns.name: MetricName
columns.description: Name of the metric for the record (e.g. AppsCompleted, AppsKilled, AppsFailed , etc).

columns.name: MetricValue
columns.description: Value of metric in the record.

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Information about the record. For example a record may be tagged with 'yarn' if it is in the yarn context.

columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: ClusterType
columns.description: Type of cluster (e.g. LLAP or Hadoop).

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: QuerySubmissionTime
columns.description: Time that query was submitted.

columns.name: QueryCompletionTime
columns.description: Time that query was completed.

columns.name: Domain
columns.description: The domain associated with the query.

columns.name: RequestUser
columns.description: The client user that submitted the request.

columns.name: ExecutionMode
columns.description: The execution mode of the query.

columns.name: User
columns.description: The user of the Hive instance executing the query.

columns.name: Queue
columns.description: The queue the query was served from.

columns.name: TablesRead
columns.description: The tables read by the query.

columns.name: ClientIpAddress
columns.description: The query client's IP address.

columns.name: IsTez
columns.description: True if the query is a Tez query.

columns.name: IsMapReduce
columns.description: True if the query is a MapReduce query.

columns.name: ThreadName
columns.description: The name of the thread running the query.

columns.name: HiveInstanceType
columns.description: The type of hive instance running the query.

columns.name: SessionId
columns.description: The session ID of the query.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation associated with log record.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.

columns.name: TimeGenerated

columns.name: MetricName
columns.description: Name of the metric for the record (e.g. AppsCompleted, AppsKilled, AppsFailed , etc).

columns.name: ClusterType
columns.description: Name of cluster.

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of host where log was emitted.

columns.name: ApplicationName
columns.description: The name of the application that the metrics describe.

columns.name: ApplicationId
columns.description: The ID of the Application that the metrics describe.

columns.name: User
columns.description: The name of the user of the application.

columns.name: Queue
columns.description: The queue of the application.

columns.name: State
columns.description: The state of the application.

columns.name: FinalStatus
columns.description: The final status of the application if it has reached a terminal state.

columns.name: ClusterId
columns.description: The final status of the application if it has reached a terminal state.

columns.name: ApplicationType
columns.description: The type of application.

columns.name: StartedTime
columns.description: The time the application started.

columns.name: FinishedTime

columns.name: ElapsedTime
columns.description: The time elapsed while the application was running.

columns.description: The log aggregation status.
